CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Private User Feed
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable private feed for user. When enabled, this feature will appear at your profile page (Home) with label \'Private Activity\'

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Organization Feed
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enable private feed for organization. When enabled, this feature will appear at organization profile page. You must key in API Token below.

EditTextPreference.android:title: API Token
EditTextPreference.android:summary: API Token can be found at github.com under Account Settings -> Account Admin
